subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brad Bryant shot a five-under-par 67 to take a two-stroke lead over five other players at the AT&T Champions Classic in Santa Clarita, Calif. Nick Price, the first-round leader, shot a 77 that left him six strokes back.
snippet: Brad Bryant shot a five-under-par 67 to take a two-stroke lead over five other players at the AT&T Champions Classic in Santa Clarita, Calif. Nick Price, the first-round leader, shot a 77 that left him six strokes back.
